name: Graydle Secret Soldier Sunday Supper
text: You can destroy 1 "Graydle" card you control to draw 1 card. If you control a "Graydle" Synchro monster when you activate this effect, you can draw 2 cards instead. You can only activate this effect of "Graydle Secret Soldier Sunday Supper" once per turn. If this card is destroyed and sent to the GY: You can destroy 1 Spell/Trap card on the field.
